panels.description: Avg. of all DBs over the whole selected period

targets.query: select mean(tx) from (SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("xact_commit"), 1s) + non_negative_derivative(mean("xact_rollback"), 1s) as tx FROM "db_stats" WHERE "dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/ AND  $timeFilter GROUP BY dbname, time(5m) fill(none))
targets.rawSql:
select
  time,
  sum(avg) as tps
from (
select
  $__timeGroup(time, $__interval),
  dbname,
  avg(((c - c_lag) + (r - r_lag)) / extract(epoch from time - time_lag))
from (
        select
          (data->>'xact_commit')::int8 as c, lag((data->>'xact_commit')::int8) over w as c_lag,
          (data->>'xact_rollback')::int8 as r, lag((data->>'xact_rollback')::int8) over w as r_lag,
          time, lag(time) over w as time_lag,
          dbname
        from db_stats
        where dbname in ($dbname) and $__timeFilter(time)
        window w as (partition by dbname order by time)        
) x
where c >= c_lag and r >= r_lag and time > time_lag
group by 1, 2
) y
group by 1
order by 1

panels.title: TPS

panels.description: Avg. of all DBs over the whole selected period

targets.query: SELECT mean(calls) FROM (SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("calls"), 1s) AS calls FROM "stat_statements_calls" WHERE $timeFilter AND "dbname" =~ /^$dbname/ GROUP BY dbname, time(5m) fill(none))
targets.rawSql:
select
  time,
  sum(avg) as qps
from (
select
  $__timeGroup(time, $__interval),
  dbname,
  avg((c - c_lag) / extract(epoch from time - time_lag))
from (
        select 
          (data->>'calls')::int8 as c, lag((data->>'calls')::int8) over w as c_lag,
          time, lag(time) over w as time_lag,
          dbname
        from stat_statements_calls
        where dbname in ($dbname) and $__timeFilter(time)
        window w as (partition by dbname order by time)        
) x
where c >= c_lag and time > time_lag
group by 1, 2
) y
group by 1
order by 1

panels.title: QPS

panels.description: Avg. of all DBs over the whole selected period for regular (>10 calls) queries

targets.query: select mean(runtime) from (select non_negative_derivative(mean("total_time")) / non_negative_derivative(mean("calls")) as runtime from "stat_statements" WHERE "dbname" =~ /^$dbname/ AND $timeFilter AND calls > 100 GROUP BY dbname, time($__interval) fill(none))
targets.rawSql:
select
  $__timeGroup(time, $__interval),
  avg((tt-tt_lag)::numeric / (c-c_lag))
from (
        select 
          (data->>'total_time')::float8 as tt, lag((data->>'total_time')::float8) over w as tt_lag,
          (data->>'calls')::int8 as c, lag((data->>'calls')::int8) over w as c_lag,
          time, dbname
        from stat_statements_calls
        where dbname in ($dbname) and $__timeFilter(time)
        window w as (partition by dbname order by time)
) x
where c > c_lag and tt >= tt_lag and c > 100
group by 1
order by 1

panels.title: Query runtime

panels.description: Sum of all DB changes over the whole selected period

targets.query: select sum(diff) from (SELECT last("size_b")  - first("size_b") as diff FROM "db_size" WHERE "dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY dbname, time(3650d) fill(none))
targets.rawSql:
select
  time,
  sum(last_db_size) as total_size
from (
select
  time,
  dbname,
  max(last_value) as last_db_size
from (
  select
    date_trunc('hour', time) as time,
    dbname,
    last_value((data->'size_b')::int8) over w
  from
    db_size
  where 
    dbname in ($dbname)
    and $__timeFilter(time)
  window w as (
     partition by dbname, date_trunc('hour', time) order by time rows BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND UNBOUNDED FOLLOWING
  )
) x
group by 1, 2
) y
group by 1
order by 1

panels.title: Total DB size ch.

panels.description: Sum of all DBs. Based on a SQL based approximate.

targets.query: select sum(bloat) from (SELECT last("approx_free_space_b") - first("approx_free_space_b") as bloat FROM "table_bloat_approx_summary" WHERE "dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY dbname, time(3650d) fill(none))
targets.rawSql:
select
  $__unixEpochFrom() as time,
  sum(bloat) from
(

  select distinct on (dbname)
    dbname,
    time,
    (data->'approx_table_bloat_b')::int8 as bloat
  from
    table_bloat_approx_summary_sql
  where 
    dbname in ($dbname)
    and $__timeFilter(time)
  order by
    dbname, time

) a    

union all

select
  $__unixEpochTo() as time,
  sum(bloat)
from (

  select distinct on (dbname)
    dbname,
    time,
    (data->'approx_table_bloat_b')::int8 as bloat
  from
    table_bloat_approx_summary_sql
  where 
    dbname in ($dbname)
    and $__timeFilter(time)
  order by
    dbname, time desc
    
) b

panels.title: Total table bloat ch. (approx.)

panels.description: Avg. of all selected DB-s for the whole period

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroup(time, $__interval),
  avg((data->'load_5min')::float8)
FROM
  cpu_load
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
  AND dbname in ($dbname)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: CPU Load Avg.

targets.query: select non_negative_derivative(mean("xact_commit")) + non_negative_derivative(mean("xact_rollback")) from "db_stats" WHERE "dbname" =~ /^$dbname/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY dbname, time($__interval) fill(none)
targets.rawSql:
select
  $__timeGroup(time, $agg_interval),
  dbname,
  avg(((c - c_lag) + (r - r_lag)) / extract(epoch from time - time_lag)) as "TPS"
from (
        select 
          (data->'xact_commit')::int8 as c, lag((data->'xact_commit')::int8) over w as c_lag,
          (data->'xact_rollback')::int8 as r, lag((data->'xact_rollback')::int8) over w as r_lag,
          time, lag(time) over w as time_lag, dbname
        from db_stats
        where dbname in ($dbname) and $__timeFilter(time)
        window w as (partition by dbname order by time)        
) x
where c >= c_lag and r >= r_lag and time > time_lag
group by 1, 2
order by 1

select
  $__timeGroup(time, $agg_interval),
  dbname,
  avg((c - c_lag) / extract(epoch from time - time_lag)) as "QPS"
from (
        select 
          (data->>'calls')::int8 as c, lag((data->>'calls')::int8) over w as c_lag,
          time, lag(time) over w as time_lag, dbname
        from stat_statements_calls
        where dbname in ($dbname) and $__timeFilter(time)
        window w as (partition by dbname order by time)        
) x
where c >= c_lag and time > time_lag
group by 1, 2
order by 1

panels.description: Requires "pg_stat_statements" on server. For regular queries (calls >10)

targets.query: select non_negative_derivative(last("total_time")) / non_negative_derivative(last("calls")) from "stat_statements" WHERE "dbname" =~ /^$dbname/ AND $timeFilter AND calls > 100 GROUP BY dbname, time($__interval) fill(none)
targets.rawSql:
select
  $__timeGroup(time, $agg_interval),
  dbname,
  avg((tt-tt_lag)::numeric / (c-c_lag)) as avg_query_runtime
from (
        select 
          (data->>'total_time')::float8 as tt, lag((data->>'total_time')::float8) over w as tt_lag,
          (data->>'calls')::int8 as c, lag((data->>'calls')::int8) over w as c_lag,
          time, dbname
        from stat_statements_calls
        where dbname in ($dbname) and $__timeFilter(time)
        window w as (partition by dbname order by time)
) x
where c > c_lag and tt >= tt_lag
group by 1, 2
order by 1

panels.title: Avg. query runtime

targets.query: SELECT (non_negative_derivative(mean("xact_rollback")) / (non_negative_derivative(mean("xact_commit")) + non_negative_derivative(mean("xact_rollback"))) * 100) FROM "db_stats" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY dbname, time($__interval) fill(none)
targets.rawSql:
select
  $__timeGroup(time, $agg_interval),
  dbname,
  avg(case when c = c_lag and r = r_lag then 0 else (((r - r_lag)::numeric * 100) / ((c - c_lag) + (r - r_lag)) ) end) as tx_err_ratio
from (
        select 
          (data->'xact_commit')::int8 as c, lag((data->'xact_commit')::int8) over w as c_lag,
          (data->'xact_rollback')::int8 as r, lag((data->'xact_rollback')::int8) over w as r_lag,
          time, dbname
        from db_stats
        where dbname in ($dbname) and $__timeFilter(time)
        window w as (partition by dbname order by time)        
) x
where c >= c_lag and r >= r_lag
group by 1, 2
order by 1, 2

targets.query: SELECT last("size_b")   FROM "db_size" WHERE "dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY dbname, time($__interval) fill(none)
targets.rawSql:
select
  $__timeGroup(time, $agg_interval) as time,
  dbname,
  avg((data->'size_b')::int8) db_size
from
  db_size
where 
  dbname in ($dbname)
  and $__timeFilter(time)
group by
  1, 2
order by
  1, 2

panels.description: Requires according "metric fetching helpers" on the monitored server

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroup(time, $agg_interval),
  dbname,
  avg((data->'load_5min')::float8)
FROM
  cpu_load
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
  AND dbname in ($dbname)
GROUP BY 1, 2
ORDER BY 1, 2

panels.title: CPU load

targets.rawSql:
select
  $__timeGroup(time, $agg_interval),
  dbname,
  sum(tb-tb_lag) as temp_bytes
from (
        select 
          (data->>'temp_bytes')::int8 as tb, lag((data->>'temp_bytes')::int8) over w as tb_lag,
          time, dbname
        from db_stats
        where dbname in ($dbname) and $__timeFilter(time)
        window w as (partition by dbname order by time)
) x
where tb >= tb_lag
group by 1, 2
order by 1, 2

select
  $__timeGroup(time, $agg_interval),
  dbname,
  avg((wal-wal_lag) / extract(epoch from (time - time_lag))) as "WAL rate"
from (
        select 
          (data->>'xlog_location_b')::int8 as wal, lag((data->>'xlog_location_b')::int8) over w as wal_lag,
          time, lag(time) over w as time_lag, dbname
        from wal
        where dbname in ($dbname) and $__timeFilter(time)
        window w as (partition by dbname order by time)
) x
where wal >= wal_lag and time > time_lag
group by 1, 2
order by 1, 2

targets.query: SELECT ( non_negative_derivative(mean("blks_hit")) / (non_negative_derivative(mean("blks_hit")) + non_negative_derivative(mean("blks_read")))) * 100 FROM "db_stats" WHERE "dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/ AND  $timeFilter GROUP BY dbname, time($__interval) fill(none)
targets.rawSql:
select
  $__timeGroup(time, $agg_interval),
  dbname,
  avg( case when hit=hit_lag and read=read_lag then null else (hit-hit_lag)::numeric / ((hit-hit_lag) + (read-read_lag))*100 end) as "Shared buffers hit ratio"
from (
        select 
          (data->>'blks_hit')::int8 as hit, lag((data->>'blks_hit')::int8) over w as hit_lag,
          (data->>'blks_read')::int8 as read, lag((data->>'blks_read')::int8) over w as read_lag,
          time, dbname
        from db_stats
        where dbname in ($dbname) and $__timeFilter(time)
        window w as (partition by dbname order by time)
) x
where hit >= hit_lag or read >= read_lag
group by 1, 2
order by 1, 2

targets.query: SELECT mean("idleintransaction") + mean("waiting") + mean("active")  FROM "backends" WHERE "dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY dbname, time($__interval) fill(none)
targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroup(time, $agg_interval),
  dbname,
  avg((data->'idleintransaction')::int + (data->'waiting')::int + (data->'active')::int) as sessions
FROM
  backends
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
  and dbname in ($dbname)
GROUP BY
  1, 2
ORDER BY
  1, 2

options.content: Brought to you by:

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT dbname FROM admin.all_distinct_dbname_metrics a WHERE case when '$current_primaries_only' = 'yes' then (select (data->'in_recovery_int')::int as in_recovery_int from db_stats where dbname = a.dbname and time > now() - '1h'::interval order by time desc limit 1) = 0 else true end ORDER BY 1;
list.name: dbname
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT dbname FROM admin.all_distinct_dbname_metrics a WHERE case when '$current_primaries_only' = 'yes' then (select (data->'in_recovery_int')::int as in_recovery_int from db_stats where dbname = a.dbname and time > now() - '1h'::interval order by time desc limit 1) = 0 else true end ORDER BY 1;
